name: Nova
shortDescription: A full scale C# shopping site with user login, payment, fulfillment and listing management
longDescription: Welcome to our dynamic fashion e-commerce platform, a meticulously developed multi-page project utilizing the robust features of C# ASP.NET. Built with the efficient Entity and Identity frameworks, this web application strikes a balance between functionality and user experience.< r> Crafted with a blend of JavaScript, CSS, and HTML, the user interface delivers a straightforward and visually appealing front-end experience through Razor views. Behind the scenes, the Entity framework ensures optimal data management, while the Identity framework takes care of authentication and authorization seamlessly. The smooth integration of PayPal enhances the payment process, providing users with secure and hassle-free transactions. This large-scale project is a product of focused development, delivering a reliable and feature-rich fashion e-commerce platform without compromising on the essence of user-friendly design and technical finesse.
highlights: Handle authentication and authorization through Identity framework
Incorporates preventative measures (data validation and cleaning, harmful text escaping)
Integrate remote AzureDB through entity framework
A fully responsive layout

name: Angular Portfolio
shortDescription: A developer portfolio made from Angular 17 and SASS
longDescription: This project is a celebration of responsiveness and an immersive user experience, demonstrating the seamless integration of cutting-edge technologies.</br>Angular takes the lead in providing a robust and interactive framework, ensuring a fluid and dynamic navigation experience. SASS, combined with CSS, brings forth a visually stunning theme, enhancing the aesthetics and user engagement. JavaScript adds a layer of functionality, enriching the user interface with dynamic features. The HTML foundation ensures a well-structured and accessible profile that serves as a canvas for creativity.</br>With a keen focus on responsiveness and user-centric design, this showcase profile adapts seamlessly to various devices, ensuring a consistent and engaging experience for every visitor.
highlights: Clean and artisitic layout with small UI animations
A fully responsive layout
Built from planning to deploy within a week

name: Audio Motor
shortDescription: A html page showcasing modern UI and layout
longDescription: Crafted with SASS, JavaScript, and HTML, this website is a modern showcase, mirroring the refined layouts and design details reminiscent of major brand websites.</br>SASS brings a touch of elegance to the styling, creating a polished theme that resonates with contemporary aesthetics. JavaScript adds subtle yet impactful interactions, ensuring a dynamic user experience without compromising the website's clean and modern appearance. HTML forms the structural foundation, facilitating a well-organized and accessible layout.</br>Immerse yourself in a digital experience that transcends conventional design boundaries. This website is more than just responsive; it's an exploration of modernity and style, carefully curated to resonate with the aesthetic preferences of major brands. Welcome to a digital realm where design intricacies and layout details converge to create an online experience reminiscent of the big players in the industry.
highlights: A fully responsive layout. Font sizes and element sizes tuned through multiple media queries to ensure the best reader experience on all devices
Code reuse through SASS mixins and placeholders
Crafted carousels and sliders through Slick
Use of Gulp as build tool

name: Ray Bike Suppreme
shortDescription: Simple JavaScript game with well-designed class inheritance hierarchy to showcase the powerful of object oriented programming
longDescription: Welcome to the exhilarating universe of our JavaScript Ray-Bike game â€“ a thrilling rendition of the classic snake game, amplified with obstacles, lasers, and real-time many-body interactions. Expertly crafted using JavaScript, CSS, and HTML, this game exemplifies the potency of object-oriented programming, employing a sophisticated multi-level object inheritance model for unrivaled code reusability and modularity.</br>Immerse yourself in the heart-pounding action as you navigate through a visually captivating terrain, where every twist and turn brings forth real-time responsiveness. JavaScript takes the lead, orchestrating a seamless gaming experience, while CSS adds a layer of aesthetic finesse, creating a polished and visually engaging environment. HTML lays the structural groundwork, ensuring a robust foundation for the game's multifaceted elements.</br>Beyond the thrill of gameplay, this project serves as a showcase for the versatility of JavaScript in building intricate and interactive applications. The object-oriented paradigm not only streamlines the codebase but also fosters a modular design, facilitating scalability and ease of maintenance. Prepare for an immersive journey that not only challenges your gaming prowess but also underscores the dynamic capabilities of JavaScript in delivering an exceptional and cutting-edge gaming experience. Welcome to the forefront of gaming innovation, where code sophistication meets adrenaline-pumping gameplay.
highlights: Well-designed class inheritance hierarchy to promote code reuse
A real-time gaming application necessitating precise numerical computation to deliver a seamless and immersive gameplay experience.
Designed for scalability in object interaction complexity

name: MVDB Cinema
shortDescription: React-Redux application that showcase real-time movie detail with through immersive page design

name: Mace Travel
shortDescription: Multi-page teamwork project that explores the concept of responsive design and JQuery
longDescription: As a collaborative effort within a team, I engaged in a multi-page project that delved into the intricacies of responsive design and JQuery implementation. Our project aimed to create a seamless and adaptable user experience across various devices, showcasing our adeptness in employing contemporary web development methodologies. Through this endeavor, we honed our skills in crafting user-centric interfaces and optimizing performance, contributing to a comprehensive exploration of modern web design principles.
highlights: Built using only HTML, CSS, and JQuery
A responsive layout

name: Microservice Ticketing App
shortDescription: A self-learning project that employs a microservice architecture deployed on Google Cloud Platform
longDescription: This self-learning project builds a ticket selling website that employes a microservice architecture using Docker and Kubernetes to explore the power of horizontal scalability under a high traffic volume. The app was deployed on Google Cloud Platform with CICD handled through GitHub Action
highlights: Employes a microservice architecture deployed on Google Cloud Platform
Implemented CICD through GitHub Action
written unit tests in Jest to validate code behavior
handled user authentication through Google sign-in

name: React Redux Streaming App
shortDescription: A self-learning project that uses Redux for state management
longDescription: A self-learning project that allows signed-in users to live stream themselves or check out other live streams. The site utilizes the React and Redux to build the single page application with state management and RTMP server to handle the live streaming through connection with OBS Studio.
highlights: Allow users to live stream and watch live stream
Implemented both class components and functional components

name: Express Billing
shortDescription: A billing app with authentication, authorization and a MongoDB database
longDescription: This application allows adminstrator to add customer and items to the MongoDB database then create pdf invoices base on the order information. Signed in users can log on this app to view their invoices. The authentication and authorization are handled by Passport.js. This app is complete and ready to be pushed for production use.
highlights: Authentication and authorization handled through Passport.js
Views handled through EJS
Data stored in a MongoDB database in the cloud
